snippet.title: Distraction Machine Teaser
snippet.description:
Welcome to Island City, an isolated metropolis filled with undead feeders and survivors battling over what few safe havens remain. You are The Distractor - a warrior bard wielding the power to soothe the living and control the undead. But will your music save your people or lead them to ruin?


Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2123770/Distraction_Machine/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/misc_studios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/miscellaneum_studios/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/miscellaneumstudios
